section_title: Issues relating to reporting and review of Annex I greenhouse gas inventories
sentences: Consultations on this matter were conducted by Chair Thorgeirsson.
Parties adopted the draft conclusions (FCCC/SBSTA/2003/L.7), and agreed to recommend a draft COP decision (FCCC/SBSTA/2003/L.7/Add.1).

The conclusions recommend that COP-9 adopt the draft decision relating to the technical review of greenhouse gas inventories, which contains a training programme for ERT members, a code of practice for the treatment of confidential information, and an agreement for expert review services for members of ERTs.
